resources.string: Tag does not have enough memory for message
NFC needs to be enabled in order to read and write data from a NFC tag. If you do not enable NFC, then the NFC features of this app will not work.
Failed to connect to WiFi network, please try again
WiFi sticker data is invalid. Please rewrite WiFi sticker
Failed to write to tag, please try again
Check out InstaWifi, an Android app that lets you connect to WiFi networks instantly

Download InstaWifi on the Android Market (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.jessechen.instawifi), it is a cool Android app that allows you to share and connect to WiFi networks instantly.

Scan this QR code to connect to the WiFi network \"%1$s\". For Android devices, use the \"Barcode Scanner\" app, download link (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.zxing.client.android).\n\nThis QR code was generated via InstaWifi (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.jessechen.instawifi).
To add a new network, WiFi needs to be on.
This app requires WiFi to work.
Your version of Google\'s Play Store does not support in-app billing. Sorry for the inconvenience.
Love the app? Donate to support the developer!
USA/CANADA/MEXICO ONLY: Donate 4$ and I will send you one Android NFC sticker as a gift. 6$ gets you 2, and 10$ gets you 4. No additional shipping costs!
Send me my NFC stickers! Order ID: %1$s
Send me my NFC sticker! Order ID: %1$s

Hi Jesse,

I'm awesome for donating %1$d$. Below is my name and address to send me my %2$d NFC sticker(s):

Name: 

Address:

I will make sure to contact you if I ever have any questions or comments. Thanks!
Thank you so much for supporting an independent developer. Email me your name and address so you can enjoy your Android NFC sticker(s)!
Hi, thank you so much for supporting an independent developer. You are awesome!

Instructions for the NFC tab:
1) Choose the network to configure or add a new network from menu.
2) Fill out all the network details.
3) Tap the "Write to Tag" button.
4) Tap NFC sticker to write to tag
5) Connect to that WiFi network by tapping on the sticker.
6) Tap again to disable WiFi.
Android Beam: Fill out network details and hold the phone against another NFC-enabled Android smartphone with InstaWifi installed to automatically connect the other phone to the network.

Instructions for the QR tab:
1) Choose the network to configure or add a new network from menu.
2) Fill out all the network details.
3) Share the created QR image by tapping on the share icon in the menu.
4) Any Android smartphone with the Barcode Scanner app (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.zxing.client.android) can now scan the QR image to connect to that WiFi network.

Your donation will support an independent developer who wants to make life easier for people like you by writing Android apps. If you live in USA, Canada or Mexico, then as a token of appreciation I will send you a Android-themed NFC sticker as a gift if you donate 4$, 2 for 6$, and if you\'re awesome, 4 for 10$. After going through the in-app billing system, your email application will launch. Just fill out the email and I will ship your Android-themed stickers to you as soon as possible. Thanks!
